metadata.description: Agent Skills for security, CTF, and hacking tasks by Happy Hacking Space

plugins.name: vt
plugins.description: Spin up intentionally vulnerable environments from the terminal. Deploy labs like DVWA, Juice Shop, and WebGoat for security training and CTF practice.

plugins.name: dit
plugins.description: Classify HTML pages, forms, and fields using machine learning. Detect page types, form types, and field types from HTML content or URLs.

plugins.name: funurl
plugins.description: A functional URL Swiss Army knife. Parse, modify, encode, decode, and deduplicate URLs from the command line.

plugins.name: sindoq
plugins.description: AI Sandbox for secure code execution. Run untrusted code in Docker, Podman, Wasmer, gVisor, Firecracker, Kubernetes, or cloud providers.

plugins.name: gakido
plugins.description: High-performance Python HTTP client with browser impersonation, TLS fingerprinting, and anti-bot evasion. Supports HTTP/1.1, HTTP/2, and HTTP/3.
